projects.title: To-Do-List
projects.description: Developed a to-do list app using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Implemented a user interface that allows users to add, edit, and delete to-do items. Used JavaScript to add functionality to the app, such as the ability to check off completed items.

projects.title: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
projects.description: Created a fully functional Tic Tac Toe game using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Implemented game logic to enable two-player functionality, allowing users to play against each other in real-time. Designed an engaging and visually appealing user interface with CSS styling.

projects.title: Library Management System
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive library management system using C++ from scratch. Designed an intuitive user interface allowing librarians to manage book inventory, borrower records, and administrative tasks. Implemented features such as book search, check-in/check-out functionality, fine calculation, and user authentication.

projects.title: Login Registration Form
projects.description: Created a login/signup system in C++ that can handle many users at once using threads. Made sure passwords were secure by using a special method to scramble them. Used special tools to ensure data security when many users were accessing the system simultaneously.

achievements.title: Winner of the Ramanujan Math Competition
Participation in DeFi AI chat Bot Hackathon
